name: Radicchio Salad
description: In My Pizza Lahey has included recipes for many of the fabulous non-pizza menu items on offer at his New York pizzeria, Co., including this fascinating Radicchio Salad. It's a salad full of bitter, earthy flavors interspersed with creamy-pungent bites of Taleggio and bursts of sweet-sour balsamic vinegar.
recipeIngredient: 280 grams (1 medium head) radicchio, sliced into 1/2-inch strips
80 grams (about 8 medium) shiitake mushroom caps, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the radicchio among individual plates. Drizzle with the vinegar and oil and sprinkle with the salt. Break the cheese into ¾-inch chunks and arrange them around each plate. Top with the sliced mushrooms.
